raw_affiliation_strings: Stefano Bambi, MSN, RN, University of Florence, Emergency and Trauma Intensive Care Unit, DAI-DEA, Azienda Ospedaliero Universitaria Careggi, Largo Brambilla 3, 50134 Florence, Italy ([email protected]

Stefano Bambi, MSN, RN, is a PhD candidate in nursing science at the University of Florence and is from the Emergency and Trauma Intensive Care Unit of Azienda Ospedaliero Universitaria Careggi, Florence, Italy. He is a staff nurse in the Emergency and Trauma Intensive Care Unit. He was formerly a lecturer in emergency and critical care nursing at University of Florence (Italy).
[email protected]).

He is a staff nurse in the Emergency and Trauma Intensive Care Unit. He was formerly a lecturer in emergency and critical care nursing at University of Florence (Italy).

affiliations.raw_affiliation_string: Andrea Guazzini, Psych, is an associate researcher at the Centre for the Study Of Complex Dynamics (CSDC), Department of Science of Education and Psychology, at the University of Florence, Italy. raw_affiliation_strings: Enrico Lumini, PhD, MSN, RN, is from University-Hospital Integrated Department at Azienda Ospedaliero Universitaria Careggi, Florence, Italy. He is currently a lecturer in emergency and critical care nursing at University of Florence (Italy).
